sentences.en: Adam sought guidance from the Almighty.
All of a sudden I heard an almighty crash from the kitchen.
sentences.cn: 突然我听到厨房里传来一声巨响.

sentences.en: Almighty God / God Almighty appeared to Jacob in the land of Canaan.
sentences.cn: 全能之神在迦南福地对雅各显灵.

sentences.en: Almighty God, have mercy on us.
sentences.cn: 全能的上主，请垂怜我们。

sentences.en: God Almighty, Hart, you scared me silly.
sentences.cn: 哎呀，哈特，你把我都吓傻了！

sentences.en: God Almighty, I am yours and my dreams are yours.
sentences.cn: 全能的上帝, 我是你的,我的梦也是你的.

sentences.en: He was wore down almighty thin when I left.
sentences.cn: 我离开的时候,他确实给折腾得模样儿都变了.

sentences.en: I had the most almighty row with the waitress.
sentences.cn: 我和女招待大吵了一架。

sentences.en: I have sworn before you and Almighty God the same solemn oath.
sentences.cn: 我已在你们和全能的上帝面前作了庄严的誓言.

sentences.en: Jah also comes from a strong biblical reference and derivative of the word Jehovah, yet another word for god, king or almighty being.
sentences.cn: 耶和华也来自于强烈的圣经参考和单词耶和华的派生词，还有另一个单词为上帝，国王或万能的主。

sentences.en: Let us now confess our sins to Almighty God.
sentences.cn: 现在让我们向上帝忏悔我们的罪恶。

sentences.en: My lord, I have received my sentence of death from the Almighty.
sentences.cn: 老爷, 我已接受了上帝判处我的死刑.

sentences.en: The Almighty God has blessed our land in many ways.
sentences.cn: 万能的上帝已用许多方式赐福我们的国度.
全能者/全能的上帝/全能的天父

sentences.en: The next moment there was an almighty crash.
sentences.cn: 接着发生了剧烈的撞击。

phrases.tran_cn: 万能的上帝；全能真神；全能的神（等于God Amighty）
全能的神；全能的上帝；全能真主

trans.tran_cn: 全能的，极大的，十分严重的
trans.tran_en: expressions used to talk about God that emphasize His power
